required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 11, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of MIRCERA in Participants With Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 3-4 and Not on Dialysis

brief_summary.textblock: An observational, longitudinal, multi-center, non-interventional study in participants with chronic kidney disease (CKD) stage 3-4, assessed by Modification of Diet in Renal Disease (MDRD) to collect data regarding safety and efficacy in participants with pre-dialysis situation who are treated with MIRCERA in normal clinical environment.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hemoglobin (Hb) Value of Greater Than (>) 100 and Less Than (<) 120 Grams Per Liter (gm/L) at Month 6 Before Inclusion
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of >100 and < 120 gm/L at Month 3 Before Inclusion
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of >100 and < 120 gm/L at Baseline
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of > 100 and < 120 gm/L at Month 3 After Inclusion
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of > 100 and < 120 gm/L at Month 6 After Inclusion
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of > 100 and < 120 gm/L at Month 9 After Inclusion
Percentage of Participants Reaching a Hb Value of > 100 and < 120 gm/L at Month 12 After Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 6 Before Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 3 Before Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 3 After Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 6 After Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 9 After Inclusion
Mean Hb Value at Month 12 After Inclusion
Percentage of Participants With Hb Fluctuation From Pre-Baseline (Month -6) to Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Hb fluctuation was defined as change in Hb value >15 gm/L between 2 visits.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Hb Fluctuation From Baseline to Month 12
primary_outcome.description: Hb fluctuation was defined as change in Hb value >15 gm/L between 2 visits.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Change in MIRCERA Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Change in MIRCERA treatment included changes in dose, frequency, and route of administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Number of MIRCERA Dose Changes
Correlation of Hb Levels With Underlying Disease
Correlation of Hb Levels With Levels of Inflammation
Percentage of Participants With Changes in Iron Supplement
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who had any change in their iron supplement medication at a specified visit were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Changes in Immunosuppressive Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who had any change in their immunosuppressive medication at a specified visit were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Changes in AntihypertensiveTreatment
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who had any change in their antihypertensive medication at a specified visit were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Different Medication Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants who were receiving different treatments (antihypertensive, immunosuppressive, iron supplements, and others) before and/or after baseline were reported. Same participant could be reported in more than one category.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Required Blood Transfusion
Percentage of Participants Who Required Renal Replacement Therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Renal replacement therapy was defined as hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis.

arm_group.description: Pre-dialysis participants with CKD treated with MIRCERA according to the current standard of care and in line with the current local summary of product characteristics were observed for maximum of 12 months.

study_pop.textblock: Adult participants with CKD Stage 3-4 treated with MIRCERA

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult participants above 18 years of age
- Pre-dialysis participants with CKD stage 3-4 treated with MIRCERA and continue in the pre-dialysis state for the whole study period
- Estimated glomerular filteration rate (e-GFR) between 15-60 milliliter per minute (mL/min) (calculated)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants involved in interventional trials
- Participants with life expectancy less than 1 year
- Active malignancy
- Planned living kidney transplant within 6 months.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The study being conducted under this Agreement is part of the Overall Study. Investigator is free to publish in reputable journals or to present at professional conferences the results of the study, but only after the first publication or presentation that involves the Overall Study. The sponsor may request that the confidential information be deleted and/or the publication to be postponed inorder to present the Sponsor's intellectual property rights.
